architectural_notes: Image viewer container should remain fixed at 85% of app size on all devices; images must scale proportionally to fit within the container without overflowing (handle varying aspect ratios/resolutions).
known_issues: Current image viewer breaks with varying image ratios/resolutions; images can overflow/off-screen and layout is inconsistent between mobile/desktop modes.

existing_features.title: Update the Photo Gallery dialog (the app’s only image viewer) so the viewer container size is always 85% of the app/viewport on both mobile and desktop, and does not change based on the displayed image’s dimensions.

Ensure gallery images always scale proportionally to fit entirely within the fixed viewer area (no cropping) and never overflow outside the viewer bounds, regardless of image aspect ratio or resolution.

new_feature_requests.summary: Fix the app's single image viewer to keep a constant viewer size (85% of app size) across mobile/desktop and scale images proportionally to fit inside without overflow, regardless of image aspect ratio/resolution.

projectName: Fix Photo Gallery image viewer to constant 85% size with proportional image fit
